definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: near Bab., only ´[[בִּקְעַת ד]]: Da 3:1, LXX. tou= peribo/lou (Syro-Hex. peri/bolon), Q Deeira; Dûru is name of several places in Babylonia Dl:Par. 216; Baer Dn. p. x, cf. Andr:M 58*; Hoffm:Pers. Märtyrer 164 f.; name of small river and mounds Opp:Expêd. i. 238 f. (v. Dr); improb. expl. as = rwr zôr, depression (name actually used of lower Euphr. and Tigris valleys) by Wetzst:De Jes:3 701 f.; Bab. dûru = wall.
